name: Heathen - The sons of the law
description: Indie game inspired by the novel "The island of Doctor Moreau" by HG Wells.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Core i5-2400 3.1GHz or AMD CPU FX-8320 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: Screen resolution 1024x768 or greater
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Core i7-3770 4-Core 3.4GHz or AMD CPU FX-8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4GB or Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: Screen resolution 1920x1080
